To: Ingie Chalhoub <Ingie.Chalhoub@etoilegroup.com>; Patrick Chalhoub <Patrick.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>; Geeta Manjal <Geeta.Manjal@chalhoub.com>; Hiba Assaf <hiba.assaf@etoilegroup.com>; Lali Das <Lali.Das@chalhoub.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Joe Hobeika <Joe.Hobeika@chalhoub.com>; Ramanathan Arumugam (ram@stonehaven.ae) <ram@stonehaven.ae>; Nada El Bitar; IC <IC@etoilegroup.com>; Gaia Guarino <gaia.guarino@lissoniandpartners.com>

--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear All, 

Please find attached in the link the receiving excel file and photos for the Living Divani furniture for Michels Apartment received at the Palm on the 14th August.

The file is also attached to this email.

All the furniture arrived in good order.  Several boxes were crushed a little when receiving them but the contents are all good.

Best regards

Linton
